title: Detect and protect
brief_description: The basic elements of the drug story. How do you spot whether or not your child, or any other child is using drugs? What are the tell-tale emotional changes to watch for? What are the various types of drugs and which are the most dangerous? How do you protect the youngsters against becoming part of the drug scene> This film answers these questions simply.
